# index-tts-lora [ä¸­æ–‡ç‰ˆæœ¬](https://github.com/asr-pub/index-tts-lora/blob/main/README_zh.md) | [English Version](https://github.com/asr-pub/index-tts-lora/blob/main/README.md) This project is based on Bilibili's [index-tts](https://github.com/index-tts/index-tts), providing **LoRA fine-tuning** solutions for both **single-speaker and multi-speaker** setups. It aims to enhance **prosody and naturalness** in high-quality speaker audio synthesis. ### Training & Inference

Ziel ist es, die **Prosodie und NatÃ¼rlichkeit** bei der hochwertigen Audio-Synthese von Sprechern zu verbessern. ### Training & Inferenz

RowTranslations.originContent: This project is based on Bilibili's [index-tts](https://github.com/index-tts/index-tts), providing **LoRA fine-tuning** solutions for both **single-speaker and multi-speaker** setups. It aims to enhance **prosody and naturalness** in high-quality speaker audio synthesis.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Dieses Projekt basiert auf Bilibilis [index-tts](https://github.com/index-tts/index-tts) und bietet **LoRA Fine-Tuning**-LÃ¶sungen sowohl fÃ¼r **Einzelsprecher- als auch Mehrsprecher-Setups**. Ziel ist es, die **Prosodie und NatÃ¼rlichkeit** bei der hochwertigen Audio-Synthese von Sprechern zu verbessern.

Content: #### 1. Audio token and speaker condition extraction

RowTranslations.originContent: #### 1. Audio token and speaker condition extraction

Content:
```shell
# Extract tokens and speaker conditions
python tools/extract_codec.py --audio_list ${audio_list} --extract_condition

# audio_list format: audio_path + transcript, separated by \t
```

Content: ### Fine-tuning Results This experiment uses **Chinese audio data** from *Kai Shu Tells Stories*, with a total duration of **\~30 minutes** and **270 audio clips**. The dataset is split into **244 training samples** and **26 validation samples**. Note: Transcripts were generated automatically via ASR and punctuation models, without manual correction, so some errors are expected. Example training sample, `ä»–ä¸Šäº†é©¬è½¦ï¼Œæ¥åˆ°äº†çš‡å®«ä¹‹ä¸­ã€‚`ï¼š[kaishu_train_01.wav](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/22354621/kaishu_train_01.wav) #### 1. Das Datenset ist unterteilt in **244 Trainingsbeispiele** und **26 Validierungsbeispiele**. Hinweis: Die Transkripte wurden automatisch mittels ASR und Interpunktionsmodellen erzeugt, ohne manuelle Korrektur, daher sind einige Fehler zu erwarten.
